original_text: And he made the horns thereof on the four corners of it; the horns thereof were of the same: and he overlaid it with brass.
korean_text: 그 네 모퉁이 위에 그 뿔을 만들되 그 뿔을 제단과 연결하게 하고 제단을 놋으로 쌌으며

sentences.original_text: And he made the horns thereof
on the four corners of it
the horns thereof were of the same
and he overlaid it with brass
